root.name: Cafeteria Nipponica
root.description: OverviewDeveloped by Kairosoft, Cafeteria Nipponica allows you to run a franchise of restaurants. In standard Kairosoft fashion, the game revolves around improving locations and perfecting recipes within a 15 year timeframe.GameplaySimilar to other games in the franchise, Cafeteria Nipponica focuses on the micro-management of a business. In this case, multiple restaurants. Focusing on designing menus, interior decorating, buying ingredients, developing and improving dishes and managing staff.RecipesResulting DishIngredient 1Ingredient 2Ingredient 3Fried
